pull.title: http: Restrict maximum size of http + headers
pull.body:
Prevent memory exhaustion by sending lots of data.
Also add a test to `httpbasics.py`.

Closes #6425

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.body: ~~Will this restrict https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6844 such that transactions greater than 8kB will be restricted?~~

To be precise, it restricts the size of request line + headers, the first part of the request. The body is limited separately (to a much larger size).

#6844 should use POST data to submit the transaction, which is not affected by this.
ut ACK - agree "http + headers" in commit msg seemed to imply http body

events.message:
http: Restrict maximum size of request line + headers

Prevent memory exhaustion by sending lots of data.
Also add a test to `httpbasics.py`.

Closes #6425

issue.title: HTTP Server cherries
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6719 - Make HTTP server shutdown more graceful                
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6859 - http: Restrict maximum size of http + headers          
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6990 - http: speed up shutdown                                
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7966 - http: Do a pending c++11 simplification handling work items
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8421 - httpserver: drop boost (#8023 dependency)              
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11006 - Improve shutdown process

issue.title: HTTP servers Core ports
issue.body:
Leverage @dagurval's work on XT in porting a series of enhancements to the HTTP server handling the RPC requests. These are the list of the imported PRs: 

Port Core's #6719 - Make HTTP server shutdown more graceful
Port Core's #6859 - http: Restrict maximum size of http + headers
Port Core's #6990 - http: speed up shutdown
Port Core's #7966 - http: Do a pending c++11 simplification handling work items
Port Core's #8421 - httpserver: drop boost 
Port Core's #11006 - Improve shutdown process

_**depends on #1004**_

issue.title: Small httpserver.cpp backports
issue.body:
Also includes a change to the `uiInterface.NotifyBlockTip` signal API.
These remove merge conflicts from subsequent backports for `sync.h`.

Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6859
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7112
  - Only the non-QT changes.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7966
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8421
  - We already backported the second commit in zcash/zcash#2555

labels.name: C-upstream-port
labels.description: Category: Changes that are ported from the Bitcoin Core codebase.

labels.name: S-scratching-an-itch
labels.description: Status: Something we haven't planned for a sprint but are doing anyway

comments.body:
Wait, this PR is only further restricting the headers.
Shouldn't the title be then: "http: Restrict maximum size of headers"

This should also be restricting the body size, but to something much larger.

Edit: derp it is below!
